Hi there! — I’m Omodolapo Nurudeen, a first-year BME PhD student at *Johns Hopkins University*.  
My research lies at the intersection of computational genomics and neuroscience.  
I explore how emerging computational and statistical tools can deepen our understanding of the brain.

###  Fun Facts
- When I’m not doing schoolwork, you’ll probably find me exploring a new fantasy world through books or movies.  
- I love crafting**, and I’m a huge tea enthusiasts, any type of tea, anytime ☕
